name: Wild Doom
description:
You are Colt, a strong cowboy that lost a duel and died. 

You were not a great person so you went to Hell for your torment. But suddenly the devil had an offer for you, an offer that could bring you back alive and you were going to take that offer.

As part of the deal, you will have to defeat waves of demons for your freedom.  Hell has a lot of surprises in store for you.  Although that pistol of yours can't get you far so you will have to:

Want to set them on fire? Want to kill three demons with one bullet? The store has weapons that you can unlock: Sniper, Flamethrower, Revolver and other guns! But guns are not your only way to get stonger.

After each wave you'll get to choose from three upgrades. More bullets, health or damage and much more, combine them to become stronger! In addition every 20 seconds a boost chest spawns, it contains timed boosts.

So what are you waiting for, get out there and fight for your freedom!

This game is still in development. It would mean a lot if you rated the game and left a comment! This game is free, but if you are willing to support us, feel free to donate!
